import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';// @ts-ignore
import AnimatedNumber from'animated-number-react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import images from'utils/images';export default function Ammo(){const[count,setCount]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{rpc.register('HUD-SetAmmo',setCount);rpc.callClient('getCurrentAmmo').then(setCount);return()=>{rpc.unregister('HUD-SetAmmo');};},[]);return count?/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"hud_ammo"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(AnimatedNumber,{className:"hud_ammo-count",value:count,duration:200,formatValue:parseInt}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("svg",{className:"hud_ammo-icon"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("use",{xlinkHref:"".concat(images.getImage('ammo.svg'),"#icon")}))):null;}
